sentences.en: a branch of mathematics/physics/biology etc
sentences.cn: 数学/物理/生物学等的分支

sentences.en: a branch office in Boston
sentences.cn: 在波士顿的分公司

sentences.en: A branch whipped her across the cheek.
sentences.cn: 一根树枝抽打到了她的脸颊。

sentences.en: A thrush alighted on a branch of the pine tree.
sentences.cn: 一只鸫落在松树的树枝上。

sentences.en: After the storm, the ground was littered with twigs and branches.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨过后，满地都是大大小小的树枝。

sentences.en: All branches of government are having to cut costs.
sentences.cn: 所有政府部门都必须削减开支。

sentences.en: Have you met our branch manager , Mr. Carlson?
sentences.cn: 你有没有见过我们的分公司经理卡尔森先生？

sentences.en: He hacked at the branch until it fell off.
sentences.cn: 他朝着树枝砍,直到砍下来为止.

sentences.en: He hammered the nail into the branch.
sentences.cn: 他把钉子钉到了树枝上。

sentences.en: He reached up for an overhanging branch.
sentences.cn: 他伸手去够悬在头顶上的树枝。

sentences.en: He struck off the branch with a single chop of the ax.
sentences.cn: 他一斧子就砍掉了那根树枝.

sentences.en: Oncology is the branch of medicine dealing with tumors.
sentences.cn: 肿瘤学是研究肿瘤的医学分支。

sentences.en: Psychiatry is an accepted branch of medicine.
sentences.cn: 精神病学是公认的医学分支。

sentences.en: She now works in our Denver branch.
sentences.cn: 现在她在我们的丹佛分部工作。

sentences.en: The bank has branches all over the country.
sentences.cn: 这家银行在全国各地都有分行。

sentences.en: The bank recently opened a branch in Germany.
sentences.cn: 这家银行最近在德国开设了分行。

sentences.en: The boy had a small branch of a tree in his hand.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩手上拿一条小树枝.

sentences.en: The forces of National Socialism were transforming Germany root and branch.
sentences.cn: 纳粹主义势力当时正在彻底改变德国。

sentences.en: The investigation is being handled by Scotland Yard's anti-terrorist branch.
sentences.cn: 调查由伦敦警察厅反恐部门负责。

sentences.en: The topmost branches were full of birds.
sentences.cn: 树梢上停满了鸟儿。

sentences.en: The two halves of the main branch have grown apart.
sentences.cn: 主枝的左右两边各向不同的方向生长.

sentences.en: They’re planning to open a branch in St. Louis next year.
sentences.cn: 他们计划明年在圣路易斯开一家分店。

sentences.en: We'll have to branch off shortly to get to the village.
sentences.cn: 我们不久就要走岔路去那个村子.

sentences.en: When in danger, the anteater lashes its tail round a branch.
sentences.cn: 遇有危险，食蚁兽会迅速用尾巴卷住树枝。

sentences.en: When you reach the village green, the street branches into two .
sentences.cn: 到了村中心的公共草地，这条街就分岔成两条路。

sentences.en: Where’s their nearest branch?
sentences.cn: 他们最近的分店在哪里？

words.tran_cn: 分叉；扩展（branch的过去分词）；长出树枝

phrases.tran_cn: v. 长出枝条；扩展范围；偏离主题
主枝；主分支；中央领导技
橄榄枝（象征和平）；谈和的建议；小孩
国外分支机构；海外分店
（英国警察部门的）政治保安处

trans.tran_cn: 树枝，分支，旁系，部门，机构，支流，岔路，（血管）分枝
trans.tran_en: a part of a tree that grows out from the  trunk (=  main stem  )  and that has leaves, fruit, or smaller branches growing from it
to divide into two or more smaller, narrower, or less important parts
